function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Large sample survey during COVID-19 lockdown","Impact":"Risk of spreading the virus through physical interaction during data collection","Mitigation":"Conduct surveys online and ensure strict adherence to social distancing and safety guidelines for any in-person data collection","Technologies":"Online survey platforms, video conferencing for virtual contact","People":"Survey respondents, data collectors, researchers","Owner":"Research team, survey administrators"},{"Description":"Anonymity and confidentiality in survey","Impact":"Risk of breaching confidentiality and privacy of participants' information","Mitigation":"Implement strict data security measures, obtain consent for data collection, and ensure anonymity of respondents","Technologies":"Secure data storage, encryption, secure survey platforms","People":"Survey respondents, data collectors, researchers","Owner":"Research team, survey administrators"},{"Description":"Mental health impact assessment","Impact":"Potential psychological distress due to the evaluation of depressive, anxiety-related symptoms, and quality of life during a stressful period","Mitigation":"Provide guidance for mental health support and counseling resources, offer mental health support services for participants","Technologies":"Telemedicine platforms, mental health apps, online counseling services","People":"Survey respondents, mental health professionals","Owner":"Research team, mental health support providers"}]}
